    • Method Detail

      • getRawSteps

        public List<List<Long>> getRawSteps(Timestamp start,
                           Timestamp stop)
        Fetches the timestamps of all raw steps that occurred between the two timestamps start and stop. Sorts them by source and returns lists of lists of timestamps where each list correlate to a source.
        Parameters:
        start - - Get steps that occurred after this timestamp.
        stop - - Get steps that occurred before this timestamp.
        Returns:
        A list of list of step timestamps.

      • getHoursBack

        public static Timestamp getHoursBack(int hours)
        Returns timestamp for number of hours counting backwards
        Parameters:
        hours - - 0 means current, 24 means 24 hours back, etc
        Returns:
